bodies.description:
{center: begin}{size : 30}{outline : #000000 , 2}{shadow: #0017FF, 2, 3, 4}{color : #A5FFF4}Trident Mobile v3.0.0{center: begin}{size : 30}{outline : #000000 , 2}{shadow: #0017FF, 2, 3, 4}
Ghosts Update is here!{color}{center}{size}{outline}{shadow}

{color: #FF9900}Trident Mobile Update Information:
{color}- Ghost Cards Implementation
- Removal of Unlocked Unit Changes
- Safety Measures have been inplemented
   and improved

{color: #FF9900}What are Ghosts Cards?
{color}Ghost cards are units that will be added to your box,
however, only the player can see and use these cards,
while the game server will never see the ghost cards
because to the server,{color: #FFFF00} Ghost Cards do not exist, hence
the name Ghost Cards.{color}. Ghost Units will also be
{color: #FF0000}Locked Units{color}.

{color: #FF9900}Are Ghost Cards Safe?
{color}{color: #FFFF00}Yes!{color} Ghost cards have been implemented with safety measures
to protect the user so that the game server sees only legitimate
information while using{color: #80B3FF} Trident Mobile{color}. This includes areas
such as {color: #FF0000} World Tournament, Chain Battle, and Ultimate Clash.{color}

{color: #FF9900}Unlocked Unit Changes Removed
{color}Previously,{color: #80B3FF} Trident Mobile{color} would change your{color: #FFFF00} Unlocked Cards{color}
to better and more powerful cards. Now,{color: #FFFF00} Unlocked Cards{color} will
remain untouched by{color: #80B3FF} Trident Mobile{color} so you can safely obtain
summonable anddrop units without them being replaced
while they are unlocked.

{color: #FF9900}Team Slot Setup
{color}When using Ghost cards,{color: #FFFF00} Team Slot 1{color} will be your 'Real Team',
you can NOT use Ghost Cards on{color: #FFFF00} Team Slot 1{color}, only legitimate
cards. If you try to use Ghost Cards on{color: #FFFF00} Team Slot 1{color}, an error will
pop up telling you that you are using a Ghost Card.{color: #FFFF00} Team slots 2
through 7{color}, are teams you will be able to use{color: #33CC33} Real{color} and{color: #9933FF} Ghost
{color}Cards on your team. Because Team 1 data is being sent to the
server, If you make a team with Ghost units you can use
those ghost teams on events as long as team 1 meets
the restrictions if events have them like SBR and ESBR.
Once you make your Team in{color: #FFFF00} Team Slot 1{color}, you do not have to
edit that team or use that team at all, it is meant as a
placeholder for the data being sent. You can differentiate your
{color: #33CC33}'REAL'{color} units from{color: #9933FF} 'GHOST'{color} units via the{color: #FF0000} Tag System{color}.

{color: #FF9900}Locked or Favorited Units
{color}The{color: #FFFF00} locked{color} or{color: #FFFF00} favorited{color} units in your box, will never be changed
to other units.{color: #FFFF00} Locked{color} or{color: #FFFF00} Favorite{color} units will be Maxed out in
{color: #FF0000}Potential, Link Levels, Super Attack Level, and given best
equipments{color} determined by{color: #80B3FF} Trident Mobile{color}.
